sentences.en: As a result, the procedural cost - benefit calculus often becomes an exercise in poorly informed guesswork.
sentences.cn: 结果是, 程序性的 成本效益 计算常常成为缺少信息的推测.

sentences.en: In addition to procedural checks on discretion, informal action is usually subject to judicial review.
sentences.cn: 非正式行动在自由裁量权方面除了受程序制约外, 通常还受司法审查的制约.

sentences.en: No doubt someone had pulled a fast one on her over a procedural matter.
sentences.cn: 无疑有人在程序性问题上骗了她。

sentences.en: Pompidou was in fact saddling us with a procedural monstrosity.
sentences.cn: 蓬皮杜实际在用程序问题吓唬我们.

sentences.en: The APA's informal rulemaking process is simple and flexible , consisting of only three procedural requirements.
sentences.cn: 《行政程序法》的非正式规则制定程序简单灵活, 只包括三个程序要求.

sentences.en: The application of procedural due process to informal administrative action is treated in Chapter 6.
sentences.cn: 程序性正当程序对于非正式行政行动的运用将在第六章予以阐述.

sentences.en: The business of the committee was delayed by procedural difficulties.
sentences.cn: 委员会的事务因程序上有困难而耽搁了.

sentences.en: The CEQ regulations now contain detailed procedural requirements for the entire EIS process.
sentences.cn: 现行的环境质量委员会规则,包括了整个“环境影响报告书”过程中的详细程序要求.

sentences.en: The Constitution is the source of many of the procedural principles that administrative agencies must observe.
sentences.cn: 宪法是行政机关必须遵循的众多程序原则的渊源.

sentences.en: The Court also gave considerable emphasis to the procedural deficiencies in the Act.
sentences.cn: 法院也相当重视该法在程序方面的欠缺.

sentences.en: The history of liberty has largely been the history of the observance of procedural safeguards.
sentences.cn: 自由的历史在很大程度上是遵守程序保障条款的历史.

sentences.en: The incentive is financial; the requirements are essentially procedural.
sentences.cn: 这一动机是由于财政问题而引起的, 这样的要求是基本的程序.

sentences.en: The Paris talks will mainly be about procedural matters.
sentences.cn: 巴黎会谈将主要围绕程序上的事宜。

sentences.en: The procedural steps are quite straightforward.
There are a variety of complicated procedural devices set out in exhaustive detail in the section.
sentences.cn: 还有一些各种各样的混杂的诉讼程序和烦琐的细节.

words.tran_cn: 经过特殊加工（或处理）的
过程，进行；方法，步骤；作用；程序；推移
[计] 处理器；处理程序；加工者
开始；继续做；行进（proceed的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: connected with a procedure, especially in a law court
